title: Legal information - OpenProject
content: Legal information Data protection and information security are of central importance in our company andare one of the main motives for the development of this open source software. Privacy Policy  The Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data as either a visitor to our websites or as a customer.   View Policy Privacy Policy The Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data as either a visitor to our websites or as a customer. Terms of Service  With our Terms of Service we aim to give our customers the advantages and freedom of using an open source application and at the same time to ensure the continuous development of the software in an active developer community.   View Terms Terms of Service With our Terms of Service we aim to give our customers the advantages and freedom of using an open source application and at the same time to ensure the continuous development of the software in an active developer community. Service Description  The Service Description amends the terms of service of the OpenProject Enterprise cloud and the OpenProject Enterprise on-premises.   View Description Service Description The Service Description amends the terms of service of the OpenProject Enterprise cloud and the OpenProject Enterprise on-premises. Data Processing Agreement  The Data Processing Agreement (DPA) defines our obligations under European privacy law (GDPR).   View DPA Data Processing Agreement The Data Processing Agreement (DPA) defines our obligations under European privacy law (GDPR). Sub-Processors  OpenProjectâs list of sub-processors which we may use as part of provisioning our services to you.   View List Sub-Processors OpenProjectâs list of sub-processors which we may use as part of provisioning our services to you. Technical and Organizational Data Security Measures  More about our data security measures.   Find out more Technical and Organizational Data Security Measures More about our data security measures. Digital Accessibility Statement  Our commitment for accessibility at OpenProject.   View statement Digital Accessibility Statement Our commitment for accessibility at OpenProject. EVB-IT  A well-established framework for standardizing public IT procurement in Germany.   View EVB-IT EVB-IT A well-established framework for standardizing public IT procurement in Germany. Contributor license agreement (CLA)  If you want to contribute to OpenProject, please make sure to accept our Contributor License Agreement first.   View agreement Contributor license agreement (CLA) If you want to contribute to OpenProject, please make sure to accept our Contributor License Agreement first.
